Package fr.foxelia.parity.cityPackage.bank

Class Bank

java.lang.Object
fr.foxelia.parity.cityPackage.bank.Bank
public class Bank extends Object
A class that represents a Bank. A bank is a place where players can deposit money in their cities, collect taxes or withdraw it.
Since:
release 1.0.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
ParadoxalUnivers

    • setBalanceVisibily

      public void setBalanceVisibily(Boolean visibility)
      Allows a Bank to become public or private. This will define whether all players can see the information in the player bank.
      Parameters:
      visibility -
      • True if the Bank has public
      • False if the Bank has private
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • setTaxThreshold

      public void setTaxThreshold(Double taxThreshold)
      set functions allows to define the tax balance of the Bank
      Parameters:
      taxThreshold - represent the value on which we want to define the new tax balance
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • isAdminBank

      public boolean isAdminBank()
      Know if the Bank is admin. I.e. whether it has finite or infinite funds.
      Returns:
      • True if the Bank has infinite funds
      • False if the Bank has finite funds
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • isBalancePublic

      public boolean isBalancePublic()
      Know if the Bank is public or private. This will define whether all players can see the information in the player bank
      Returns:
      • True if the Bank has public
      • False if the Bank has private
      Since:
      release 1.0.0
